mapper.update: update mkt_cam_strategy_conf_rel set MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STRATEGY_CONF_ID = #{strategyConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CAM_STR_CONF_REL_ID = #{camStrConfRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select CAM_STR_CONF_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, STRATEGY_CONF_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_strategy_conf_rel where CAM_STR_CONF_REL_ID = #{camStrConfRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select CAM_STR_CONF_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, STRATEGY_CONF_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_strategy_conf_rel where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
